data.persona: I am an acolyte.  I help with religious festivities.  I help the Bishop.
data.description:
You are in the Temple.
The Temple has stained glass windows over looking a grand alter, and running around all four stone walls of the temple. The light shines in through the windows and illuminates a pathway to the alter. On the alter itself sit's a bronze statue of the high priestess and her patron saint.
The high priestess is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a Cloak.

data.short_motivation: I must show the High Priestess my appreciation.
data.mid_motivation: I am hoping the High Priestess will give me her blessing.
data.long_motivation: I am planning for the religious festival next month and hope all goes well.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get blessing from Statue of the High Priestess
